name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms　VIII with Power Up Kit / 三國志VIII with パワーアップキット
description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅷ with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅷ," which was released in 2001 as the 8th game in the series. RTK Ⅷ is a Historical Simulation game where players direct their heroes in a bid for power over all of China amongst the turbulent times of the...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. & Traditional Chinese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 pixel over, High Color DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. & Traditional Chinese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 pixel over, High Color DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
